DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim pragmatic randomized-controlled trial determine effectiveness scalable 6-month intervention aim decrease SSB consumption ( SIPsmartER ) compare match contact physical activity promotion control group ( MoveMore ) .
DOC.brief_title: SipSmarter : A Nutrition Literacy Approach Reducing Sugary Beverages
DOC.detailed_description: The primary aim application target at-risk resident rural southwest Virginia county : 1 . Determine effectiveness SIPsmart SIPsmartER decrease SSB consumption compare match contact control group target walk behavior . The secondary aim : 1 . Explore causal pathway change SSB attitude , subjective norm , perceive behavioral control influence behavioral intention SSB consumption , extent change SSB consumption mediate change nutrition numeracy nutrition-related medium literacy . 2 . Determine reach representativeness , adoption feasibility , degree intervention implement intend ( associated cost ) , maintenance behavior change 6 12 month post intervention ( i.e. , 18 month baseline ) compare control . 3 . Assess intervention impact body weight . An exploratory aim : 1 . Assess intervention impact 13C biomarker , new non-invasive biomarker fingerstick technique add sugar intake , evaluate change biomarker time .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion include Englishspeaking adult > 18 year age , consume > 200 SSB kcals/day , selfreport contraindication physical activity , regular access telephone . To minimize potential confounds , one member per household eligible enroll individual concurrently enrol Cooperative Extension program program focus improve nutrition .
